metadata.title: Endika Orube | Tech Lead & Product Engineer
metadata.description: Endika Orube's portfolio. Tech Lead & Product Engineer with 7+ years of experience in software development, leading teams and building digital products.

about.description1: 7+ years building software that matters. Tech Lead & Engineering Manager of a team of 20+ developers on a critical banking project (+1M users).
about.description2: I combine deep technical expertise -architecture, testing, XP- with strategic product vision. I lead from solution definition to delivery, ensuring every line of code adds real business value.

product.title: PRODUCT VISION
product.description: I collaborate with POs and Business to define solutions that maximize user value. From problem to implementation.

xp.title: EXTREME PROGRAMMING
xp.description: TDD, Pair Programming, CI/CD, Continuous Integration. XP methodologies applied at scale in large teams.

architecture.title: SOFTWARE ARCHITECTURE
architecture.description: Hexagonal Architecture, Micro-frontends, Design Systems. Technical decisions for systems that scale.

leadership.title: LEADERSHIP & MENTORING
leadership.description: I lead technical teams, define standards, foster quality culture. Direct manager of 8 engineers.

biko2Lead.description: I lead the frontend team (+20 devs) of digital banking (+1M users), combining technical direction and people management with a strategic product vision.

engineering.title: Engineering & Product Strategy
engineering.text: I collaborate with POs, Business and Design to define technical solutions. I lead the Angular → React migration focused on security, Time-to-Market and UX.

excellence.title: Technical Excellence & XP
excellence.text: TDD, Continuous Integration, Pair Programming. Robust architecture capable of evolving with the business.

innovation.title: Innovation & Applied AI
innovation.text: Team Context Engineering (Rules, Commands, MCPs for Azure DevOps). Significant improvements in speed and quality.

management.title: People Management
management.text: Direct manager of 8 engineers. 1-on-1s, career plans and continuous training.

biko2Senior.description: Core developer building the new booking engine (high traffic), operating under strict Extreme Programming methodology.

architecture.title: Architecture & Modern Stack
architecture.text: Next.js + Hexagonal Architecture deployed on Vercel. SEO and Core Web Vitals optimized.

product.title: Product Vision & Design
product.text: Key link between design and development. Translated complex mockups into efficient components.

observability.title: Observability & Production
observability.text: Monitoring and alerting strategies (Sentry/Datadog) for service stability.

quality.title: Quality & Culture
quality.text: TDD and CI/CD. Mentoring new team members to accelerate onboarding.

nubbaLead.description: Hybrid role of technical leadership and product. Final responsible for delivery in consulting and own SaaS products.

product.title: Integral Product Management
product.text: Complete cycle: technical pre-sales, requirements, UX/UI design, implementation and maintenance.

business.title: Business Strategy
business.text: Technical demos and market feedback converted into roadmap. University of Navarra, Doctors Without Borders.

leadership.title: Technical Leadership & Mentoring
leadership.text: Defined architecture and standards. Transformed team from 1 to 5 developers.

nubbaFullStack.description: Second developer in a 4-person startup. Critical responsibility from day one in Web and Mobile development.

development.title: End-to-End Development
development.text: Custom solutions for corporate clients and internal SaaS products.

stack.title: Technology Stack
stack.text: Backend (PHP/Symfony, MySQL), Frontend (Angular 2+) and Hybrid Mobile (Ionic).

culture.title: Startup Culture
culture.text: Problem-solving mindset. Critical incident management in limited resource environment.

banking.title: DIGITAL BANKING PLATFORM
banking.description: Angular → React migration. Scalable architecture for +1M users. TDD, CI/CD, Optimistic UI. Leading team of 20+ developers.

booking.title: BOOKING ENGINE
booking.description: Next.js + Hexagonal Architecture. Strict XP. High traffic. SEO and Core Web Vitals optimization.

saas.title: ENTERPRISE SOLUTIONS
saas.description: Own products from scratch. Full-stack. University of Navarra, Doctors Without Borders. Commercial strategy.

designSystems.title: DESIGN SYSTEMS & MICRO-FRONTENDS
designSystems.description: Reusable, documented and tested components. Scalable architecture for multiple teams.

teaching.title: XP & SOFTWARE ENGINEERING COURSE
teaching.subtitle: Lead instructor at Biko2/Jakala
teaching.description: Training that goes beyond code: TDD, Hexagonal Architecture, XP, Pair Programming, CI/CD. Focus on sustainable and professional development.

vibe.title: BEYOND 'VIBE CODING' WITH AI
vibe.description: Context Engineering and strategies to integrate AI in professional development without losing quality.

rendering.title: RENDERING STRATEGIES IN REACT
rendering.description: Technical deep dive: CSR, SSR, SSG, ISR, RSC. Modern architectures and their impact on Performance and SEO.
